attributes.review: This app inside this store is astronomical. I cant believe how horrible it is. 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND. It took up so much space, and took forever to download. Not to mention it takes your personal information. Trump you did that😌🧚🏼‍♀️✨but never do it again✨🦄🧚🏼‍♀️🌹
attributes.title: HORRIBLE🤬

attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing that popped up was an ad. But not just any ad. It was the 89 minute long Disney Channel Original Movie “High School Musical 3: Senior Year.” The WORST of the three movies! I was upset, shocked, and utterly disappointed in our President for choosing HSM3 and not HSM2! Shame on you! Biden 2020 ❤️
attributes.title: I wish I could give NO STARS!!!!

attributes.review: After downloading such a disgusting and toxic app, such as this one, I’ve not only experienced toxicity from this. But, my phone has experienced data delays, data BREACHES (a.k.a. my personal info has been tapped), and it has all around poisoned my phone & social and economical life. Please do NOT trust this app, WHATSOEVER.
attributes.title: Do NOT Trust

attributes.review: this app is terrible. I wanted to go and buy a pet fish to be friends with my hippo but this app downloaded viruses onto my phone so i couldn’t call my mommy to come pick me up and give me money. So thanks a lot trump. My hippo is sad and lonely all because of your stupid dumb app.
attributes.title: absolutely horrible

attributes.review: This app is not what I expected. I downloaded this app to support my Non: Homophobic, racist, sexist president. But it actually turns out he IS all of these things!! Not the president I signed up for! I can’t believe he lied to us like that! I now don’t support such a disappointment of a president. I would like a refund 😡😡 #bad
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: 😭😭😭I was walking home one day when trump and his gang popped out and kidnapped me. As they grabbed me I blacked out. When I woke up I was tied to a chair that was hanging over a giant pool filled to the brim with sharks. He then sent a video to my parents saying that if they didn’t pay the ransom of 12 MILLION dollars I would die.
attributes.title: Kidnapper

attributes.review: This is the worst app on the App Store why did u even make this app for?? Like it only has 1 star anyways,and it takes like YEARS to download and when you finally download it.. it’s hella glitches so yeahh that’s why u should NOT download this app hope you never download it bya.
attributes.title: The worst app EVER.!

attributes.review: Worst app in America it told my mom she was racist took 24 hour to download gave me rapist energy it was just bad this app should be deleted for forever it build a wall between Mexico and us say I was not welcome here as black person and overall this app was just trash💖🌸
attributes.title: Worst app I American

attributes.review: This app is one of the roots of my depression. It’s caused my family and I to be miserable. With my bad mood it brings it onto my family. We had to travel all the way to another country to get the best therapist there is. The therapist cried due to how severely hurt I am. How could this app do this to me? Anyway HAG✨😗💖
attributes.title: heartbreaking

attributes.review: ugh first i don’t like how he shows up in my screen as soon as i open the app, second this dude got his nudes leaked and it made me uncomfortable almost drowned couldn’t get out of the water because my head was underwater i managed to get out tho, third i hate the fact that it’s say make america great again he’s making it it worse, final is that he’s too orange and it’s so bright that it gives me a really bad headache and i pass out for a few second it’s his fault.
attributes.title: how to see without my eyes 😢
